scripts.deploy: npm run zip && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name pizza-api-manual-handler --zip-file fileb://pizza-api-manual-handler.zip
scripts.zip: powershell "Remove-Item pizza-api-manual-handler.zip -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; $items = Get-ChildItem -Path . | Where-Object { $_.Name -notin @('package-lock.json', 'deploy.bat', '.vscode') -and $_.Extension -ne '.zip' }; Compress-Archive -Path $items -DestinationPath pizza-api-manual-handler.zip -Force"
scripts.check-zip: powershell "Expand-Archive pizza-api-manual-handler.zip -DestinationPath temp-check -Force; Get-ChildItem temp-check -Recurse; Remove-Item temp-check -Recurse -Force"
scripts.create-function: aws lambda create-function --function-name pizza-api-manual-handler --runtime nodejs18.x --role arn:aws:iam::YOUR_ACCOUNT:role/lambda-execution-role --handler api.handler --zip-file fileb://pizza-api-manual-handler.zip
scripts.test-pizzas: aws lambda invoke --function-name pizza-api-manual-handler --payload '{"httpMethod":"GET","resource":"/pizzas"}' response.json && type response.json
scripts.test-root: aws lambda invoke --function-name pizza-api-manual-handler --payload '{"httpMethod":"GET","resource":"/"}' response.json && type response.json
